overview: These holes take a massive onslaught, and if you’re not paying attention they could snatch up your favoritetimepiece. When directors Tony Buff and Steve Cruz ask the question Dude! Where’s My Watch?, instead ofgiving the standard wise-guy retort- “If it were up your ass, you’d know!” – they show you serious meatpuppet action in HD and living color.
title: Dude! Where's My Watch?
